duties_responsibilities.duty: Cultivate and nurture relationships with cabinet makers, fabricators, and dealers in the San Fernando Valley.
Conduct sales activities independently in the field to drive business growth.
Maintain in-depth knowledge of the company's specialty panels and effectively communicate their benefits to potential clients.
Collaborate with internal teams to ensure customer satisfaction and successful delivery of products.
Participate in industry events and networking opportunities to expand the client base.
Prepare and submit sales contracts, orders, and other paperwork as required.
